name: Bloody Gear Mother
description:
Indie Game Dev Beginners' #003 Entry Child of the Mother Gear, Conquer LONELINESS; FRUSTRATION & FEAR! Controls: Click on lava spheres to move when in orthographic view. Press 'F2' to jump in-n-out FPS mode Usual FPS mode controls:

Move: WASD / Arrows

Look: Mouse

Sprint: Shift

Jump: Spacebar

Summary: Loneliness, Frustration & Fear are out to get you, child of the mother gear! They will attempt to push you off the ledge. They want to drag you over the coals. They want the "stuff as dream are made on" the stuff which made you. Deactivate the negative emotions by reaching the target switch. Tools I used  to make this: Modeling in Blender. Unity3d's FPS Core Project, (version 2021.3.22f1)

everything done by my own lonesome self from scratch for the jam...
